segments.text: I see the woman drying the plate, her focus so intense that she seems to exist in a world of her own.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the water flowing endlessly from the faucet, creating a puddle that slowly expands beneath her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost comical how she remains completely oblivious to the chaos behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool looks determined, but I can't help but feel a pang of anxiety watching him reach precariously for the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl’s hopeful expression makes me smile; she’s clearly part of the adventure, waiting for her treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a strange contrast, really; the serene garden outside versus the unfolding drama inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe she hasn’t noticed the water spilling over.
segments.speaker: PAR
